data.title: Detecting drugs and adverse events from Spanish social media streams
data.meta_description: Isabel Segura-Bedmar, Ricardo Revert, Paloma Martínez. Proceedings of the 5th International Workshop on Health Text Mining and Information Analysis (Louhi). 2014.
